Introduction
Port scans are commonly used for testing network security and detecting vulnerabilities in applications. However, most security breaches begin with a simple port scan with no malware installed. In order to avoid these types of attacks, enterprises and businesses require a better method for port scan reconnaissance. This will enable them to detect if their assets are vulnerable, and alert them immediately of any potential issues.
